item.title: About
item.description: I’m a PhD candidate at Boston University’s Dependable Computing Lab.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Application-Aware Scheduling of Networked Applications over the Low-Power Wireless Bus, Kacper Wardega and Wenchao Li. Design, Automation and Test in Europe (DATE), March 2020.
